name: rails recipe
description: The Recipe app keeps track of all your recipes, ingredients, and inventory. It will allow you to save ingredients, keep track of what you have, create recipes, and generate a shopping list based on what you have and what you are missing from a recipe. Also, since sharing recipes is an important part of cooking the app should allow you to make them public so anyone can access them.

name: pokemon
description: This website consumes the pokeapi and displays pokemon. The involvement api is also consumed and used for liking and commenting on the various pokemon

name: CaseMedInsurance
description: The mobile app allows the clients of CaseMedInsurance to communicate with the insurance personnel as well as make it easy to request help from the insurance personnel. When a client wants to, for example, ask for an insurance quotation, they would input required details and the app drafts and automatically sends an email to Case Medisurance which would inform them of the needs of the client so they can respond. The client app is built with flutter and dart while the backend is built with firebase and cloud functions.

name: bookstore
description: Bookstore is an app that allows you to display a list of added books, add new book and remove a book. It is built using React and Redux

name: stocks app
description: stocks-app is a mobile app that shows various company stock prices and more information about the companies. It is built using React and Redux

name: Math magicians
description: Math-magicians is a single-page application built to calculate simple mathematical operations. It is built using React and CSS.

name: CaseMedInsurance dashboard
description: This is a dashboard for the CaseMedInsurance app. The dashboard is used to enter hospital names as well as coordidates and they are entered into the database. The font end is built with JavaScript html and css and bundled with webpack. It connects to the firebase backend.

name: LeaderBoard
description: Built for fun and game activities! you can submit scores of players, create a new game. It was built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. The LeaderBoard API service is used to preserve the data

name: The Pearl of Africa tour
description: The website is for The Pearl of Africa tour. The Pearl of Africa tour is held annually and it would bring together tourists from all over the world to Uganda. It features tours to the best game parks in Uganda at no cost. The website is responsive and looks good on all types of screens. It is built with HTML and CSS.

name: Space traveller
description: Space Traveler's website was built with real live data from the SpaceX API. The application provides commercial and scientific space travel services that allow users book rockets and join selected space missions.

name: Painter
description: This app is for painting with your plain hands and also allows drawing all kinds of shapes like circles, squares and ovals in various colours as well as saving your art by taking screenshots of the canvas. The app is built with Flutter and dart.
